Package gobblin.configuration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationKeys
    A central place for all Gobblin configuration property keys.
    ImmutableWorkUnitState
    An immutable version of WorkUnitState.
    SourceState
    A container for all meta data related to a particular source.
    State
    A serializable wrapper class that can be persisted for Properties.
    StateUtils
    Utility class for dealing with State objects.
    WorkUnitState
    This class encapsulates a WorkUnit instance and additionally holds all the task runtime state of that WorkUnit.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WorkUnitState.WorkingState
    Runtime state of the WorkUnit.
